text: Lack of pep is often mistaken for patience.
author: Kin Hubbard

text: Patience is the support of weakness impatience the ruin of strength.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

text: Patience is the best remedy for every trouble.
author: Plautus

text: If I have done the public any service, it is due to my patient thought.
author: Isaac Newton

text: All men commend patience, although few are willing to practice it.
author: Thomas a Kempis
